articles.author: Joanne Kenen
articles.title: They help seniors push back against a deluge of health misinformation - The Washington Post
articles.description: Even without a lot of social media use, disinformation finds older Americans. It’s on their phones, in their texts, in their email and through the grapevine.
articles.content:
CULPEPER, VA Gladys Williams has been a nurse, a social worker and a special ed teacher.
Now, shes a one-woman bulwark against a geyser of misinformation and disinformation about health, medicine an… [+8052 chars]

articles.author: Jennifer M. Wood
articles.title: Female Pilot in Crash Trump Blamed on DEI Was Top 20% Army Cadet - The Daily Beast
articles.description: Capt. Rebecca M. Lobach died when the Black Hawk helicopter she was co-piloting collided with an American Airlines jet.
